title: Choosing a dog
creator_credit: Frank Gardner and Central Office of Information
brief_description: A film survey of British bred dogs. The salient physical and mental characteristics of different breeds are examined and appealing portraits of canine favourites appear on the screen. A more serious activity of these animals - their invaluable services as guide dogs to the blind - is also illustrated.
